
```{r}
bostonArea
set.seed(343)
train <- sample(nrow(bostonArea)*.8)
bostonArea[-train,] 
bostonArea[train,]
```

```{r}
log <- glmnet(target_no ~ distance_to_center + angle_from_center, data = bostonArea, family = "multinomial")
```
